page.title: 05Science and Technicology
page.content: Donside Seed Laboratory was set up in July 1985 by Mrs. Patricia A. Horne in order to provide an independent, personalised seed testing service to Agricultural and Horticultural seed users. It is the aim of the laboratory to provide test results geared to the specific problems or worries of the individual client. The concept was founded on work carried out for Rolawn Turf Growers Ltd. of York who require large samples of grass seed to be check tested for specific weed seed contamination. This service has been expanded to cover weed searches, cereal germination 1000 seed weights and other aspects of seed quality assessment.
